name: Jump Kick
description: You leap into the air to deliver a strong kick to a creature. Make a melee attack against a target, doing 4d4 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. On a miss, you take 1 damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

effect.name: A very appealing move, but after using this move, the user is more easily startled.
effect.effect: Pokemon has disadvantage on all CHA Saving Throws for the remainder of the Appeal Rounds.
